column1: text
Apple Inc. reported Q4 2023 revenue of $89.5 billion, with earnings per share reaching $6.05. The stock ticker is AAPL.
Microsoft announced Q4 earnings of $52.9 billion with operating income of $24.3 billion. MSFT trading at $370.
Tesla Inc. delivered record revenue of $81.5 billion in 2023, with gross profit margin of 25.2%. Ticker: TSLA.
Amazon reported Q4 revenue of $169.9 billion, up 11% YoY. Operating income grew 41% to $10.6 billion. AMZN stock.
Google parent Alphabet Inc. generated search revenue of $42.8 billion in Q4. Cost per click increased 3%. Ticker GOOGL.
Meta Platforms reported advertising revenue of $114.9 billion for 2023, down 2% from prior year. Stock price $420.
NVIDIA delivered revenue of $60.9 billion in fiscal year 2024, up 126% YoY. Gross margin of 75.1%. NVDA ticker.
JPMorgan Chase reported net revenue of $161.4 billion and net income of $37.7 billion. ROE of 15.1%.
Berkshire Hathaway's operating earnings were $302.09 per A share. Stock portfolio increased to $315.8 billion.
ExxonMobil reported annual net income of $55.7 billion on revenues of $413.7 billion. XOM dividend of $3.96.
Pfizer reported 2023 revenue of $58.5 billion with COVID revenue declining to $0.5 billion. PFE stock.
Johnson & Johnson reported sales of $94.9 billion with adjusted operating margin of 37.5%. JNJ dividend growth.
Visa reported total operating revenues of $29.2 billion in fiscal year 2023. V stock reached record highs.
MasterCard reported revenues of $19.5 billion in 2023, up 11% from prior year. MA net revenues increased.
Intel reported total revenue of $54.2 billion in 2023, with gross margin declining to 42.8%. INTC price.
AMD reported annual revenue of $22.7 billion in 2023, representing 4% growth. EBITDA of $8.1 billion.
Broadcom reported total net revenue of $33.8 billion in fiscal year 2023. Gross margin of 69.4%. AVGO.
Qualcomm reported total revenues of $44.2 billion in fiscal year 2023, up 11% YoY. QCOM operating income.
Netflix reported annual revenue of $31.6 billion with net income of $6.9 billion. NFLX subscriber base 247M.
Disney reported total revenues of $96.7 billion in fiscal year 2023. Operating income of $13.1 billion. DIS.
